content: स्मार्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्मृतौ विहितः, स्मृतिं वेत्त्यधीते वा अण्] {@--1@} Relating to memory. remembered, memorial. {@--2@} Being within memory. {@--3@} Based on or recorded in a Smṛti, prescribed in a code of laws; कर्म स्मार्तविवाहाग्नौ कुर्वीत प्रत्यहं गृही <ls>Y. 1. 97</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 108.</ls> {@--4@} Legal. {@--5@} Following or professing the law-books. {@--6@} Domestic (as fire). --र्तः {@--1@} A Brāhmaṇa well-versed in traditional law. {@--2@} One who follows the traditional law. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a sect. --र्तं An act or rite enjoined by the Smṛti, a legal act.
